      • initButton

        protected void initButton()
        Performs button initialization, setting up onclick listeners etc. Override if the default behavior (start tool if it isn't started, stop if if it is) isn't sufficient.

      • onLongClick

      • setActive

        protected void setActive​(boolean active)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Called to set whether a tool is actively being used. Generally, this should be automatically handled by the onToolBegin(), onToolEnd() life cycle. Override to update GUI elements to reflect the new value.
        Overrides:
        setActive in class Tool
